ProductInfo.Features:
4 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial stand alone DVR with 1.5TB hard drive
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
4 outdoor day night CCD 480TVL security camera, 24 Infrared Leds, 3.6mm wide view angle Lens
Package included: Digital Video Recorder, DVR Remote Control, DVR Power Supply, User Manual and Software CD, USB Mouse, 1.5TB Hard Drive. 4 Pack 50 Feet Security Camera Wire. 4 Color CCD Dome Cameras. 1 of 4 channel Power Supplies
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV 4 Channel Audio Video H.264 Security Surveillance DVR System, including Stand Alone Real Time Digital Video Recorder with 1500GB Hard Drive, 4 Outdoor Day Night Vision CCD Security Cameras 480TVL, 4 Pack 50 Feet Video Power Cable, Camera Power Supply 1R3
